title: All Ball - Pt. 1: Georgia Tech HC Josh Pastner on, Walking On at Arizona, Lute Olson Lessons, Following Coach Cal
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 1: Georgia Tech HC Josh Pastner on, Walking On at Arizona, Lute Olson Lessons, Following Coach Cal
description:
In this episode, Doug sits down with Georgia Tech Head Coach Josh Pastner for the first installment of a multiple part interview, where they discuss his youth hoops background growing up in Houston, how he landed a walk on spot on for Lute Olson at Arizona, his memories from the '97 national championship run, the unbelievable way he got the Memphis job, and the challenges of following Coach Cal and keeping the program together. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
